name: Take That, Ya Lousy Dimension!
description:
TRAPPED in the mysterious THIRD DIMENSION, it's up to you to explore this STRANGE and FANTASTICAL new realm before TIME and SPACE as we know it is DESTROYED FOREVER.

Sound Effects:
DunDunDunnn - copyc4t. http://freesound.org/people/copyc4t/sounds/146434/

Textures:

MarbleGreen0001 - http://www.textures.com/download/marblegreen0001/4...

Controls:

Click to begin, WASD + Mouse to move, ESC to quit.
